target.name: run-all-tests
target.description: Call and executes all test cases (targets)

target.name: UserTests
target.description: Call and executes all user test cases (targets)
target.echo: Successfully ran all User UI tests!

target.name: Login
target.description: Runs login test and verifies Main Menu's Title

target.name: Logout
target.description: Runs logout test and verifies Login's Title

target.name: PasswordHint
target.description: Gets the user's password hint

target.name: EditUser
target.description: Tests selecting the 'Edit Profile' forward

target.name: SearchUser
target.description: Tests search for and displaying all users

target.name: SaveUser
target.description: Tests editing and saving a user

target.name: AddUser
target.description: Adds a new user profile

target.name: Signup
target.description: Signup a new user

target.name: ActiveUsers
target.description: View Active Users List

target.name: FlushCache
target.description: opens JSP to Flush Page Cache

target.name: FileUpload
target.description: Tests uploading a file
